ing: 2 (16 ounce) packages cocktail sausages (such as Lit'l SmokiesÂ®)
des: "A sweet and savory treat for any get-together that will sure be a crowd pleaser. It's cheap and easy to make in a slow cooker with only three ingredients. I make this for any get-together and it is always a hit! I was a little unsure at first about the grape jelly concoction, but I tried it and have never done it any other way. It is so savory with just enough sweet. I always receive or over hear lots of agreement with the taste of the sauce. It always disappears at parties, and the next day I have cravings for these cocktail wienies. Try it for your next potluck, back yard BBQ, or any event!"
ins:
Stir barbeque sauce and grape jelly together in a slow cooker; add cocktail sausages and stir.
Cook on Low for 2 to 3 hours.
